column5: Harbor View Town Homes on North Padre Island is the newest high end development on the Texas Gulf coast. Located just two blocks from the beautiful beaches of the Gulf Of Mexico our guests enjoy all that island life has to offer. Stunning sunset canal views, wide boat slips, heated resort style pool and high end amenities are hallmarks of our property. Just 6 large luxury homes make up the complex you can get away from it all but still enjoy easy access to the water, beach and island excursions.
column8: NEW! Luxury 4 Bedroom Town Home! Pool & Boat Slip!
